ygData.subject: Re: Some assembled skills/traits connect
ygData.msgSnippet: Jonathan, definately put your points into strength and either agil or dex if you can. I made mistake of not putting enough strength into my rogue (did NO
ygData.messageBody:
Jonathan, definately put your points into
strength and either agil or dex if you can.<br>I made
mistake of not putting enough strength into my rogue (did
NO research prior to making character, DOH). Ive had
to spend money on strength items ever since or hope
for groups that can buff my str, agil AND dex to
fight effectively.<br>Int and Wis are more important in
caster characters than in rogue.<br>When you finally get
the game, feel free to ask any questions you
want.<br>Im on Tholluxe Paells server as Andaliza Elvenspire,
level 26 rogue.<br>Good luck.
